entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning in the evening and ending after midnight then 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
